sentence: We stayed at hotel for 7 nights we booked through a preferred partner and we were very disappointed with the actual room we got far from everywhere 1 km from breakfast and promised priority on golf carts transportation not actually held true noisy and in a place that is very difficult to find anything we would not like to look at we had direct view to the back of the hotel with Maintenance services etc

attitude when you could even finally get their attention which is a big shock compared to the consistent bend over backwards atitutude at other FS locations and really we are not high maintenance and are very willing to take care of most things on our own

I have booked all activities in advance and sure enough there was a printed confirmation for each activity as to when it would happen where to go and etc and they have constantly updated us any changes in activity on a daily basis so that we will not forget
The bungalows could probably do with a reno but I have nothing but great praise for the Four Seasons Resort in Bora Bora
Need better maintenance
This was true of maintenance staff housekeeping and restaurant personnel
We called over to reception and maintenance came quickly
You can order Room Service schedule a buggy pickup schedule spa treatments request room maintenance just about everything you need
This property needs a lot of maintenance to bring it up to the Four Seasons standards
When we questioned it after opening it we were told the menu had not been updated
All in all this was a trip of a lifetime and I look forward to returning once the Four Seasons completes a massive renovation
I heard a three year renovation will commence in September
The houses on the water are nice but I wo n’t be surprised if they will be renovated in the next years
The actual vow renewal was beyond romantic and all the little requests that I had made were accommodated
But it was just a minor minor issue also if you are an exercise person the gym has 2 bikes 4 treadmills free weights and a few machines that are fairly modern and updated
Four Seasons Bora Bora needs a renovation asap
Some renovation work was occurring and was handled with the Four Seasons flair perfectly
The pool service people were the best so friendly and constantly refreshing us with iced water the “ house ” water is filtered so no need to buy water here
Needs complete renovation expansion and modernization
The decor is lovely but the revamp is needed from a maintenance perspective as some fittings fixtures furniture are showing their age in regards to wear and tear
The resort is undergoing renovations right now so there was a daily resort credit given which was a nice touch
The whole hotel is being renovated so the overwater are just better that we could imagine

When I began arranging the trip back in July 2019 I contacted American Express Platinum travel and they informed me that the hotel was undergoing an extensive renovation and would n’t be up to speed until December
There is also a new Executive Chef that has refreshed all the dining menus with more options and in our opinion more flavorful food
At times we would have our room cleaned and our towels would not be refreshed or there would be sand left at the door
